村内: (そんない) - interior of a village
村外れ: (むらはずれ) - edge of town; outskirts of a village
村夫子: (そんぷうし) - rural scholar or pedagogue; pedant
村庄: (そんしょう) - village; countryside; country house
村役場: (むらやくば) - village office; local administration office in a village
村時雨: (むらしぐれ) - autumn shower; fall shower
村立: (そんりつ) - established or operated by a village
村肝の: (むらきもの) - (pillow word for 心)  amassed feeling; build-up (of thoughts)
村興し: (むらおこし) - revitalization of a village; village renewal (project)
村芝居: (むらしばい) - play put on in a village; play put on by villagers
村落共同体: (そんらくきょうどうたい) - village community
村費: (そんぴ) - village expenses; at village expense
村起こし: (むらおこし) - revitalization of a village; village renewal (project)
村長: (むらおさ) - village headman; village mayor
村雲: (むらくも) - gathering clouds; group of clouds
杓る: (しゃくる) - to dig out/to gouge out/to hollow out; to scoop/to ladle/to bail; to jerk (one's chin)
杓れる: (しゃくれる) - to be concaved/to have a concave shape; to be crooked (chin)
杓子定規: (しゃくしじょうぎ) - (yoji) hard-and-fast rule; stick fast to rules; a stickler (for rules); hidebound system; inflexible
杓子果報: (しゃくしかほう) - (yoji) coming by ample servings of delicious food; being blessed with good fortune
杓文字: (さもじ) - wooden spoon; ladle; rice scoop
杓鴫: (シャクシギ) - curlew (any bird of genus Numenius)
杖: (じょう) - Cajado, bengala, bastão, cajado, varinha
杖とも柱とも頼む: (つえともはしらともたのむ) - to count on someone as the only support
杖を携える: (つえをたずさえる) - to carry a cane
杖柱: (つえはしら) - person upon whom one relies
杖術: (じょうじゅつ) - form of martial art using a cane staff
杖道: (じょうどう) - form of martial art using a cane staff
杖鼓: (チャング) - janggu (Korean hourglass drum); janggo; changgo
杜仲: (トチュウ) - hardy rubber tree (near-threatened species often used in Chinese medicine, Eucommia ulmoides)
杜仲科: (とちゅうか) - Eucommiaceae (monotypic plant family containing only the hardy rubber tree)
杜仲茶: (とちゅうちゃ) - Tochuu tea (high in minerals and reputed to be beneficial for weight loss and in cases of high blood pressure)
杜夫魚: (かくぶつ) - fourspine sculpin (species of fish, Cottus kazika)
杜撰: (ずざん) - careless/sloppy/faulty; author who makes many mistakes/author who uses unsupported references
杜撰脱漏: (ずさんだつろう) - (yoji) careless (slipshod) and with many omissions
杜斤: (ちぎばかり) - large beam balance; weighbeam
杜氏: (とじ) - chief brewer at a sake brewery
杜父魚: (かくぶつ) - fourspine sculpin (species of fish, Cottus kazika)
杜衡: (カンアオイ) - Asarum nipponicum (species of wild ginger)
杜鵑草: (ホトトギスソウ) - toad lily (Tricyrtis hirta)
束になって掛かる: (たばになってかかる) - to attack all in a bunch; to attack all at once
束になる: (たばになる) - to form a group; to form a bunch
束ねる: (つかねる) - to tie up in a bundle (e.g. straw, hair, bills, letters)/to bundle/to sheathe; (たばねる only) to govern/to manage/to control/to administer; (つかねる only) to fold (one's arms)
束の間: (つかのま) - moment; brief time; brief; transient
束修: (そくしゅう) - entrance fee/initiation fee/registration fee/present to a teacher; gift of dried meat from a new vassal or pupil
束帯: (そくたい) - old ceremonial court dress
束柱: (つかばしら) - short pillar standing between a beam and roof ridge
束縛: (sokubaku) - restrição, limitação, grilhões, jugo, algemas; amarração, confinamento com corda
束縛変項: (そくばくへんこう) - bound variable
束縛継承原理: (そくばくけいしょうげんり) - binding inheritance principle; BIP
束脩: (そくしゅう) - entrance fee/initiation fee/registration fee/present to a teacher; gift of dried meat from a new vassal or pupil
束表項目: (たばひょうこうもく) - bundle table entry
束髪: (そくはつ) - hairstyle introduced in the Meiji era consisting in a bun or chignon tied at the back of the head
条: (jou) - cláusula, artigo (em documento), disposição; faixa, listra, linha; embora, ainda que; já que, como, porque, visto que
条件が揃う: (じょうけんがそろう) - to satisfy the requirements
条件を充たす: (じょうけんをみたす) - to meet the requirements; to satisfy the conditions
条件を呑む: (じょうけんをのむ) - to accept the conditions
条件を満たす: (じょうけんをみたす) - to meet the requirements; to satisfy the conditions
条件コード: (じょうけんコード) - condition code
条件付き: (じょうけんつき) - conditionally; with conditions attached
条件付きエントロピー: (じょうけんつきエントロピー) - conditional entropy; mean conditional information content; average conditional information content
条件付きコンパイル: (じょうけんつきコンパイル) - conditional compilation
